name: Party Poppers (itch)
description:
Party Poppers is a simplistic top down battle arena where you fight your friends with a growing arsenal of weapons or join together to take down hordes of robots!

the game requires a gamepad of some type and to play you simple connect the gamepad. this can be repeated an infinite amount of times to allow basically infinite players!

some secret controls include

Left Click = spawn robot

Right Click=Spawn big robot

M = Spawn Invasion bot

N= Spawn Mega Invasion bot
